subMembers.name: Configuration
subMembers.description: An object defining configuration properties for the TabPanel UI component.

subMembers.name: dataSource
subMembers.type: String | Array<String, dxTabPanelItem, any> | Store | DataSource | DataSource_Options | null

subMembers.name: itemTitleComponent
subMembers.description: An alias for the [itemTitleTemplate] property specified in React. Accepts a custom component. Refer to [Using a Custom Component] for more information.

subMembers.name: itemTitleRender
subMembers.description: An alias for the [itemTitleTemplate] property specified in React. Accepts a rendering function. Refer to [Using a Rendering Function] for more information.

subMembers.name: itemTitleTemplate
subMembers.description: Specifies a custom template for item titles.

subMembers.name: repaintChangesOnly
subMembers.description: Specifies whether to repaint only those elements whose data changed.

subMembers.name: scrollByContent
subMembers.description: A Boolean value specifying if tabs in the title are scrolled by content.

subMembers.name: scrollingEnabled
subMembers.description: A Boolean indicating whether or not to add scrolling support for tabs in the title.

subMembers.name: showNavButtons
subMembers.description: Specifies whether navigation buttons should be available when tabs exceed the UI component's width.

subMembers.name: tabsPosition
subMembers.description: Specifies tab position relative to the panel.

properties.name: dxTabPanel
properties.description: The TabPanel is a UI component consisting of the [Tabs] and [MultiView] UI components. It automatically synchronizes the selected tab with the currently displayed view, and vice versa.

Events.name: onContentReady
Events.description: A function that is executed when the UI component is rendered and each time the component is repainted.

Events.name: onDisposing
Events.description: A function that is executed before the UI component is [disposed of].md '{basewidgetpath}/Methods/#dispose').

Events.name: onInitialized
Events.description: A function used in JavaScript frameworks to save the UI component instance.

Events.name: onItemClick
Events.description: A function that is executed when a collection item is clicked or tapped.

Events.name: onItemContextMenu
Events.description: A function that is executed when a collection item is right-clicked or pressed.

Events.name: onItemHold
Events.description: A function that is executed when a collection item has been held for a [specified period].

Events.name: onItemRendered
Events.description: A function that is executed after a collection item is rendered.

Events.name: onOptionChanged
Events.description: A function that is executed after a UI component property is changed.

Events.name: onSelectionChanged
Events.description: A function that is called after selection changes.

Events.name: onSelectionChanging
Events.description: A function that is called before selection changes.

Events.name: onTitleClick
Events.description: A function that is executed when a tab is clicked or tapped.

Events.name: onTitleHold
Events.description: A function that is executed when a tab has been held for a [specified period].

Events.name: onTitleRendered
Events.description: A function that is executed after a tab is rendered.

Events.name: titleClick
Events.description: Raised when a tab is clicked or tapped.

Events.name: titleHold
Events.description: Raised when a tab has been held for a [specified period].

Events.name: titleRendered
Events.description: Raised after a tab is rendered.

Types.name: ContentReadyEvent
Types.description: The type of the [contentReady] event handler's argument.

Types.name: DisposingEvent
Types.description: The type of the [disposing] event handler's argument.

Types.name: InitializedEvent
Types.description: The type of the [initialized] event handler's argument.

Types.name: ItemClickEvent
Types.description: The type of the [itemClick] event handler's argument.

Types.name: ItemContextMenuEvent
Types.description: The type of the [itemContextMenu] event handler's argument.

Types.name: ItemHoldEvent
Types.description: The type of the [itemHold] event handler's argument.

Types.name: ItemRenderedEvent
Types.description: The type of the [itemRendered] event handler's argument.

Types.name: OptionChangedEvent
Types.description: The type of the [optionChanged] event handler's argument.

Types.name: SelectionChangedEvent
Types.description: The type of the [selectionChanged] event handler's argument.

Types.name: SelectionChangingEvent
Types.description: The type of the [selectionChanging] event handler's argument.

Types.name: TitleClickEvent
Types.description: The type of the [titleClick] event handler's argument.

Types.name: TitleHoldEvent
Types.description: The type of the [titleHold] event handler's argument.

Types.name: TitleRenderedEvent
Types.description: The type of the [titleRendered] event handler's argument.
